sub_title: Generating new (B2B2X) business models with a focus on data, privacy, security and digital identity.
summary:
A passionate marketing and innovation professional with +20 years experience on several levels. I like to develop new revenue streams with a focus on the topics of privacy, security, digital identity and data.

After having worked for several companies in several industries, in 2008 I started working at KPN. Within KPN I have had several marketing, product management and innovation roles. I gained a lot of experience in management, innovation, new business development, telecom and privacy & security.

★ Added Value ★
My added value is best described as a mix of strategic insight and hands-on execution. I have a passion in bringing new ideas to life. With my broad and many years of marketing and innovation experience, I can help your organisation to grow, by bringing ideas to life.

★ Skills and interests ★
Marketing Management - Innovation Management - Product Management - Commercial Management - Strategy - Consultancy - Security - Privacy - Digital Identity - Stakeholder management - New business development - Presentation skills - Negotiation skills - self-starter

★ Get in touch with me ★
Please get in touch with me, in order to find out if we can be of value to each other. Also, feel free to connect with me on LinkedIn and personalize your invitation.

✉ nielsvanhartevelt@gmail.com

treasury_media.description: Om zowel de veiligheid van de gebruiker, zijn gegevens en de data van uw organisatie te waarborgen, is er nu een hulpmiddel dat inloggen niet alleen sneller en makkelijker maakt, maar ook nog eens voor extra veiligheid zorgt: Mobile Connect.

profile_positions.description:
★ specialities & skills ★
Innovation management • Product Management • New Business • Business Development • Networker • Growth Hacking • Lean start-up • Design thinking • Strategy • Stakeholder Management • Digital Identity • Security • Privacy • Mobile Connect • KYC Match • Verification Services • B2B2X

Responsibilities
-	Responsible for the strategy and the vision on data driven tech, security, privacy and digital identity
-	Stakeholder management; getting the stakeholders aligned to sponsor new business ideas and eventually take-over the new business
-	Managing the backlog of new business ideas
-	Grow ideas to MVP’s and finally scalable business
-	Implement structured process of bringing ideas to life.

Biggest success
-	Started with several ideas within the vison of the team, ending up with a few new business models with signed contracts and paying customers in the digital identity space.

About KPN Open Innovation Hub
KPN Open Innovation Hub is a corporate startup builder. We keep abreast of trends and develop and implement new propositions. Only by innovating can KPN further strengthen its services at the same time as making our customers’ life more free, easy and more fun.

KPN Open Innovation Hub develops new propositions and business models in the domain of digital platforms and ecosystems. Places where network, services and users converge. We work intensively with other parties such as businesses, suppliers, startups and universities, using methodologies like design thinking and growth hacking. Everything revolves around experimenting, validating and accelerating.

Responsibilities

-	Stakeholder management; getting mostly internal stakeholders to focus on retaining customers.
-	Managing the save desk
-	And guide the medior and junior marketing managers in the team.

Biggest success
-	After years of a declining base, managing to reduce the number of leaving customers by half and the base to stabilize in 2013. 

About XS4ALL
XS4ALL was one of the first companies in the Netherlands who offered access to the internet to consumers. XS4ALL has since then always been fighting for a free and open internet. 

XS4ALL is now part of KPN and offers broadband, fiber, TV and VOIP solutions to consumers and businesses. XS4ALL is still the provider who offers consumers the best info, solutions and protection regarding privacy and security.

About KPN
We make life more free, easy and fun by connecting people. We are passionate about offering secure, reliable and future-proof networks and services, enabling people to be connected anytime, anywhere, whilst at the same time creating a more prosperous and cleaner world. 

We believe in the power of connections. By connecting we make life more free, easy and more fun. We are the network of the Netherlands and have been connecting the whole of the Netherlands for almost 140 years: people and companies, to enable them to do more together.

We are passionate about offering secure, reliable and future-proof networks and services, enabling people to be connected anytime, anywhere, whilst at the same time creating a more prosperous and cleaner world.

In 1881, we established a public telephone network in the Netherlands. On a small-scale, our country was introduced to the wonder of telecommunication for the first time. This formed the basis for KPN’s extensive network today, which reaches every corner of the country.

Then, we could only send 'beeps' via the telegraph; now, every second of the day vast amounts of information stream through our cables, antennas and transmitters. Telephone calls, but, above all, increasing amounts of data. From WhatsApp messages to television programs, from Spotify music to work documents. In addition, there are the bits and bytes that are sent without any human intervention. Smart meters that can communicate meter readings or garbage containers that report when they are full.
